      • joinQueue

        public void joinQueue​(java.lang.String qsize)
               throws ProtocolException,
                      ServerUnavailableException
        sends which lobby do you want 2/3/4 then wait until the game is started.
        Parameters:
        qsize - indication for which lobby do you want 2/3/4 players
        Throws:
        ProtocolException - Throws ProtocolException
        ServerUnavailableException - Throws ServerUnavailableException
        Requires
        qsize >= 2 && qsize <= 4

        public void computerPlayer​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players,

        Requires
